en.title: Steamventory
en.description: You must be logged into Steam, automatically filled with family users, for other users copy the name or numeric code after id or profile (steamcommunity.com/profiles/xxxxxx or steamcommunity.com/id/xxxxxx) into the field below. The games will be marked in Steam with username and icon

footer.github: We are not affiliated with Steam. This is a non-profit project. If you want to donate, you can support us on

es.title: Steamventory
es.description: Debes estar logueado en steam, autoamticamente rellenado con los usuarios familia, para otros users copia el nombre o código numérico tras id o profile (steamcommunity.com/profiles/xxxxxx o steamcommunity.com/id/xxxxxx) en el campo a continuación. Los juegos apareceran marcados en Steam con username y el icono

pt.title: Steamventory
pt.description: Você deve estar logado no Steam, preenchido automaticamente com os usuários da família, para outros usuários copie o nome ou código numérico após id ou perfil (steamcommunity.com/profiles/xxxxxx ou steamcommunity.com/id/xxxxxx) no campo abaixo. Os jogos serão marcados no Steam com nome de usuário e ícone
pt.placeholder: IDs do Steam separados por espaço

zh.title: Steamventory
zh.description: 您必须登录 Steam，自动填写家庭用户，对于其他用户，请将 id 或 profile 后的名称或数字代码 (steamcommunity.com/profiles/xxxxxx 或 steamcommunity.com/id/xxxxxx) 复制到下面的字段中。游戏将在 Steam 中标记用户名和图标
zh.placeholder: 输入 Steam ID 或用户名，用空格分隔

footer.github: 我们与 Steam 无关。这是一个非盈利项目。如果你想捐款，可以在
